Package org.husky.emed.ch.cda.digesters

Class CceDocumentDigester

java.lang.Object
org.husky.emed.ch.cda.digesters.CceDocumentDigester
public class CceDocumentDigester extends Object
Digester of CDA-CH-EMED documents. It takes any CDA-CH-EMED document as an input and creates a digest (summary) of it.
Author:
Quentin Ligier

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CceDocumentDigester

      public CceDocumentDigester()
      Constructor without parameters. It can only digest MTP, PMLC and PML (with only MTP item entries) documents.

    • CceDocumentDigester

      public CceDocumentDigester(EmedEntryDigestService emedEntryService)
      Constructor with the eMed entry service. Default digesters will be instantiated with it.
      Parameters:
      emedEntryService - The registry of EmedEntryDigest.

    • CceDocumentDigester

      public CceDocumentDigester(CceMtpEntryDigester mtpEntryDigester, CcePreEntryDigester preEntryDigester, CceDisEntryDigester disEntryDigester, CcePadvEntryDigester padvEntryDigester)
      Constructor with all four digesters. Useful if you need to overwrite them for some reason.
      Parameters:
      mtpEntryDigester - The MTP entry digester.
      preEntryDigester - The PRE entry digester.
      disEntryDigester - The DIS entry digester.
      padvEntryDigester - The PADV entry digester.

  • Method Details

    • digest

      @SideEffectFree public EmedDocumentDigest digest(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce) throws InvalidEmedContentException, InvalidMedicationTreatmentStateException
      Creates a digest of a CDA-CH-EMED document and its entries.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document to digest.
      Returns:
      an implementation of EmedDocumentDigest.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the CCE document is invalid.
      InvalidMedicationTreatmentStateException - if the treatment state is invalid.

    • getDocumentType

      @SideEffectFree public static CceDocumentType getDocumentType(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the type of the CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      an instance of CceDocumentType.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document type IDs cannot be found.

    • getPreValidityStartTime

      @SideEffectFree public static Instant getPreValidityStartTime(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce, Instant effectiveTime)
      Returns the starting time of the PRE document. It's the first known time from:
      • The start date of the 'documentationOf' attribute of the PRE document;
      • The creationTime of the document.
      Parameters:
      cce - The PRE document.
      effectiveTime - The document effective time.
      Returns:
      the inclusive prescription validity start time as an Instant.

    • getPreValidityStopTime

      @SideEffectFree public static Instant getPreValidityStopTime(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce, Instant effectiveTime)
      Returns the ending time of the PRE document. It's the first known time from:
      • The end date of the 'documentationOf' attribute of the MTP document.
      • Three months after the document start time (see ChEmedSpec.PRE_DEFAULT_DURATION_MONTHS.
      Parameters:
      cce - The PRE document.
      effectiveTime - The document effective time.
      Returns:
      the inclusive prescription validity stop time as an Instant.

    • getContentSection

      public static POCDMT000040Section getContentSection(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce) throws InvalidEmedContentException
      Returns the structured content section in the document.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the section is missing.

    • getNarrativeText

      @SideEffectFree public static StrucDocText getNarrativeText(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the document's narrative text.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      the narrative text as structured text.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the narrative text is missing.

    • getRemarks

      @SideEffectFree public static @Nullable StrucDocText getRemarks(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the content of the remarks section.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      the remarks text or null if it was not provided.

    • getPdfRepresentation

      @SideEffectFree public static Optional<byte[]> getPdfRepresentation(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the original representation as a PDF content, if present. It's decoded from the Base64 scheme.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      an optional that may contain the PDF content as a byte array.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the value is not in valid Base64 scheme.

    • getPatientDigest

      @SideEffectFree public static PatientDigest getPatientDigest(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the digest of the patient.
      Parameters:
      cce - The CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      the patient digest.
